content: stormy days are for crocheting - especially this stormy day market bag crochet pattern as are all the bags in this crochet along the stormy day market bag is worked in rounds from the bottom up once again you will be working easy stitches like single_crochet and double_crochet you will find that this bag works up quickly i love its filet crochet design this crochet pattern is available in english only and is written in american crochet terms a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial for this crochet pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 17 sts x 9 row of double_crochet = 4 inches finished size approximately 13 x 20 inches excluding the handles yarn 24/7 cotton by lion brand® 186 yds/170 m 100g/3 5 oz 100% cotton 4 worsted weight you will need 2 5 balls silver hook size g/6 4 mm hook notions yarn needle
